_xResult.title: Custom Linen Women's Vest
_xResult.shortdesc: Menswear inspired vest with satin piping
_xResult.longdesc:
Pure linen fabrics are the best to face a summer event. Linen fabrics allow your corporal heat to disipate easily and feel comfortable when you want to wear a vest over your dress shirt but don't want to sweat. The perfect addition to your beach wedding suit! The sand-colored Hurley linen fabric is dressy and yet somewhat casual at the same time.

 

Sumissura offers an infinite variety of women's made to measure formalwear and suits, so contact us to help you configure the perfect look for your special event. This vest is an example of a custom configuration. [Note: the photgraphy here shows the vest on a male body but the vest will be tailored to fit your body as you prefer.]

 

What's unique to this women's custom made vest is that the Hurley sand-colored fabric is continuous front and back so it can be worn alone or with a jacket. There are both internal and external pockets. Monogramming available on the inside pocket for an extra charge. It features satin piping along the lapel, and double-welted pockets on the front.

 

Base price of any custom vest is $99; this configuration includes a premium back panel (+$10), monogramming (+$10) and satin piping on the edge of the lapels ($13.95).

 

This Configuration:

  • Style: Single breasted, 3 button
  • Lapel: notched, standard width, with satin piping on edge
  • Front edge hem: Diagonal
  • Functional breast pocket
  • Front pockets: Double welt
  • Back panel: same fabric as front (Hurley)
  • Internal lining: Default matching
  • Buttons: Default buttons and button thread color

 

Fabric: 100% linen, Hurley (sand color)

Care: Dry clean only
